about_the_game:
Welcome to Tooncop, the ultimate hardcore horde shooter! In this game, players find themselves in a world where cartoons have escaped their shows and are causing chaos. As the world struggles to contain the mayhem, the only hope lies with Tooncop, a brave hero sent from Toon Town to save humanity.

With fast-paced action and an ever-increasing horde of mischievous cartoons to battle, Tooncop is an intense and exciting experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Find weapons and chain abilities to help you along the way as you fight your way through waves of enemies to reach the end of each level.

You have 15 minutes to get as much money and as high an XP Level as you can. The race is on, who is the real Tooncop?

So what are you waiting for? Download Tooncop today and save the world from the cartoon apocalypse!

DISCLAIMER: This is a work in progress game made by a solo developer. This is not a final representation of the game and IP. I'll be uploading new builds with improvements as time goes. If you discover and play this game, then I just want to say a whole hearted thank you. It means a lot.

name: TOONCOP

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 980
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Battle mischievous cartoons that have escaped their TV shows and save humanity in this thrilling FPS Horde Shooter. Players need to survive 15 minutes with an aim to reach the highest level possible with the most amount of cash. Do you have what it takes to step into the shoes of Tooncop?
